email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer the vessel OCEAN TRADER for your 12,500MT coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai on CIF terms.

The initial freight quote is USD 28.50 per MT. The laycan is set for 15th to 20th October, with a loading window of 48 hours. The vessel has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225m.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Sea Brokers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 27.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
John Doe
Maritime Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 27.50 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 15th to 20th October, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Sea Brokers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 27.50 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
John Doe
Maritime Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Newcastle on 15th October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Sea Brokers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
John Doe
Maritime Charterers
